name: B2X-workspace
description: B2X - Full Stack Application with .NET Aspire Backend and Vue Frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix src/frontend/Store && npm install --prefix src/frontend/Admin && npm install --prefix src/frontend/Management
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd src/frontend/Store && npm run dev" "npm --prefix src/frontend/Admin run dev" "npm --prefix src/frontend/Management run dev" --names "Store,Admin,Tenant" --prefix name --kill-others-on-exit
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:backend && npm run format:tools
scripts.format:tools: for dir in tools/TypeScriptMCP tools/VueMCP tools/HtmlCssMCP tools/SecurityMCP tools/WolverineMCP tools/B2XMCP tools/PlaywrightMCP; do [ -d "$dir" ] && (cd "$dir" && npm run format 2>/dev/null) || true; done
scripts.check:tools: for dir in tools/TypeScriptMCP tools/VueMCP tools/HtmlCssMCP tools/SecurityMCP tools/WolverineMCP tools/B2XMCP tools/PlaywrightMCP; do [ -d "$dir" ] && (cd "$dir" && npm run format:check 2>/dev/null) || true; done
scripts.check:all: npm run format:check && npm run check:backend && npm run check:tools
